About the Company: Tayo Rolls Ltd is engaged in the manufacture of Rolls,Cast Rolls,Forged Rolls,Special Castings and Pig Iron.The company has successfully diversified into production of special castings for use in power plants and has made significant presence in the industry.They have also been exporting rolls to Australia, Austria, Bangladesh, Belgium, Canada, Egypt, Germany, Indonesia, Kazakhstan, Nepal, Norway, New Zealand, Oman, Quatar, Saudi Arabia, Sweden, Singapore , South Africa, Triniland, Talwan, UAE, Romania, Chez Republic and USA..The company also in the business activities of Roll, Ingot, Pig Iron, Engg Forgings.
